name: pve
description: A seed project using Parcel, Vue and Element

scripts.buildwin: npm run cleanwin && parcel build index.html -d docs --public-url ./ && npm run preview
scripts.buildmac: npm run cleanmac && parcel build index.html -d docs --public-url ./ && npm run preview
scripts.cleanmac: rm -rf .cache && rm -rf dist && rm -rf docs && parcel index.html

author: Kory Schluter
